comment.author: 74784995@N00
comment._content: This Convair 440 was purchased by Napier and the  P&W R-2800 engines were replaced with  Napier Eland Turboprops in England making the Convair 540 which was produced in Canada as the Canadair CL-66 Cosmopolitan....later most of the Eland engines were replaced with Allison turboprops as in the Convair 580 conversion
